She managed to escape from the vampyres across the River Salve, and is paid by the local gentry for her scrying skills.

SMW Subobject for LumbridgeNPC location: Lumbridge General StoreUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 8368Examine: She's not from around here originally.Release date: 7 June 2018Image: File:Abigaila.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Abigaila

Abigaila is a refugee from Morytania who lives upstairs in the Lumbridge General Store. She can also be found by the spirit tree north-east of the Grand Exchange. She managed to escape from the vampyres across the River Salve, and is paid by the local gentry for her scrying skills.

Players can speak to her to spectate players participating in the Theatre of Blood. Before doing so, players are not allowed to bring any items with them (excluding the oculus orb), and they must not be poisoned or diseased.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A tatty toy can be found in the Lumbridge general store that bears the name of her dead son.

[[File:Abigaila chathead.png|left]]
'''Abigaila''' is a refugee from [[Morytania]] who lives upstairs in the [[Lumbridge General Store]]. She can also be found by the [[spirit tree]] north-east of the [[Grand Exchange]]. She managed to escape from the [[vampyre]]s across the [[River Salve]], and is paid by the local gentry for her scrying skills.

Players can speak to her to spectate players participating in the [[Theatre of Blood]]. Before doing so, players are not allowed to bring any items with them (excluding the [[oculus orb]]), and they must not be [[poison]]ed or [[disease]]d.

==Trivia==
* A [[tatty toy]] can be found in the [[Lumbridge]] [[general store]] that bears the name of her dead son.
